page.description: The A5_USERBELONGSTO() function indicates whether a User belongs to a Group or, if a User is not specified, if the specified Group exists. The function is not meaningful if you are logged on as "Administrator".
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = A5_UserBelongsTo(C cGroup [,C cUser [,C master_password ]])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = the user belongs to the Group or the Group exists. .F. = the user does not belong to the Group or the Group does not exist.

argument.name: cGroup
argument.description: The name of a user group.

argument.name: cUser
argument.description: Optional. The name of a user.

argument.name: master_password
argument.description: Required when a User is specified. The master password for the database.
